description: Hiroyuki`s childhood friend. She will almost always go to wake Hiroyuki up in the morning to go to school. She is especially fond of teddy bears, with special emphasis on the one that Hiroyuki gave her during their childhood. Both Akari and Hiroyuki have known each other since kindergarten and they are extremely close. She is very much in love with Hiroyuki and spends a lot of time around him. Akari likes to call Hiroyuki with the chan suffix attached, despite his occasional protests. Akari is very adept at cooking and is a member of the school`s cooking club.
name: Kamigishi Akari
